tossup_question: -   –  After ammonia is added to an unknown solution, a light blue precipitate forms. After adding more ammonia and stirring, the blue precipitate dissolves to form a royal blue solution. The initial solution most likely contains which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Zinc
X) Copper
Y) Chromium
Z) Manganese
bonus_question: -   –  A complex ion has a coordination number of 4 and exhibits cis-trans isomerism. What must the geometry of this ion be?
